name: They Came From the Sky (itch)
description:
Short demo introducing the world of Vernon and his place in it. Vernon may come to find out he has no place in it at all. What or who came from the sky and will they ever return? Sometimes it's hard to see the world change around you when you are evolving with it.

An eternal battle has been raging under the galaxies nose since the beginning of time and few mortals are chosen to join in the fray. Something about Vernon is worthy, he is unsure of his power, and now the Servants of the galaxies are questioning their decision to take him along since birth.

Can Vernon and the Servants put a stop to the jealous rage of the Envious?
